fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Demand someone make a Coven role during the day.

> Once per game, choose to become a created Coven role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> If the host decides a created Coven role is too weak, you will automatically astrally attack whoever created the role.

> Coven members cannot be targeted by your ability.

> With the necronomicon, you can shoot someone one time at night. You cannot shoot if you asked someone to create a role the previous day.

> Whichever role you become will be added to <#970046125065265202> once the game ends.
